name: Adding an item to an empty list in Cucumber
scenarioId: classpath:features/cucumber/record_todos/add_new_items_to_the_todo_list:Adding an item to an empty list in Cucumber
methodName: Adding an item to an empty list in Cucumber

testSteps.description: Given that James has an empty todo list

children.description: James starts with an empty todo list

testSteps.description: When he adds 'Buy some milk' to his list

children.description: he adds a todo item called: Buy some milk
he enters 'Buy some milk' then hits [RETURN] into 'What needs to be done?' field

testSteps.description: Then 'Buy some milk' should be recorded in his list

children.description: Then the items displayed should be a collection containing 'Buy some milk'

userStory.narrative:
In order to avoid having to remember things that need doing
  As a forgetful person
  I want to be able to record what I need to do in a place where I won't forget about them

title: Adding an item to an empty list in Cucumber
